tcs_construction.description: K7 is a Twisted Connected Sum (TCS) G2 manifold

why_numerical_is_hard.torus_approach: Scalar Laplacian on T^7 gives b3(T^7)=35, not 77
why_numerical_is_hard.correct_approach: Need Hodge Laplacian on 3-forms on actual K7 geometry
why_numerical_is_hard.challenge: TCS construction requires gluing ACyl CY3 manifolds

verification_status.recommendation: Accept b3=77 as mathematical theorem from TCS construction
